publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1882 Cathy Jamieson: Tackling Drugs Misuse: Protecting Scotland’s Communities—That the Parliament commends the Scottish Executive’s integrated approach to reducing the supply of drugs and protecting communities from drug-related offending, improving education and information for young people about the risks from drugs and increasing the range and effectiveness of local drug treatment and rehabilitation services to help people to become free from drug dependence. Supported by: Hugh Henry*
